short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It can generate passwords. What's new is the ability to create meaningless combinations of English, German and Hungarian words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It can generate passwords in the traditional way: using a combination of letters, numbers, special characters. What's new is the ability to create meaningless combinations of English, German and Hungarian words for easier memorization. For example DuckBuilding or AnilicTablemount
